description: Defines a data class 'Recipe' representing a recipe entity, with sample data list 'fakeRecipeList' containing multiple Recipe instances including their properties such as id, title, imageUrl, descriptions, ingredients, instructions, and favorite status.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Data class representing a cooking recipe with various properties including id, title, imageUrl, descriptions, ingredients, instructions, and favorite status.

methods.name: fakeRecipeList
methods.description: A list of sample Recipe objects used as mock data within the module.
